official_title: Interpersonal Psychotherapy in Adolescents With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosed with PCOS duration > 3 months
* 12-17 years old
* BMI > 75th percentile
* CESD > 16
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Weekly or bi-weekly therapy with licensed behavioral health provider
* Inability to speak, read, or write in English (teen)
* Major medical conditions
* HbA1c > 7.0%
* Hormonal contraception < 3 months
* Metformin < 3 months
* Antidepressants/psychotropic medications < 4 weeks
